post:
Tired of poor quality of service from The Other Guys? Come to IPXcore! We have great service and great true 24/7 support; you'll love us!

We're announcing our San Diego service, available immediately! This marks our return to "west coast" service, and should provide excellent connectivity to Asia and Australia! To this end, we're offering a coupon code for 10% off any Premium OpenVZ product: SANDIEGORELEASE

Our service is out of AIS Lightwave for San Diego, and Colocrossing Buffalo for Buffalo.

Some company info:
We've been up and running since May of 2011. We're running OpenVZ virtualization on our very own Dell, HP, and Supermicro -powered hardware.
Each server node has it's own 100mbit connection. 
Past-30-days support ticket mean response time:  0 Day(s) 0 Hour(s) 17 Minute(s) and 22 Second(s)

**The plans:**

**IronVZ:**
192mb of RAM
32mb of vSwap
15gb of disk space
300gb of monthly transfer
1 IPv4 address

<s>$2.49/month</s> **_$2.24/month_** with coupon code SANDIEGORELEASE

San Diego, CA: <a href="https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=79&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3"> HERE </a>
Buffalo, NY: <a href="https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=5&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3"> HERE </a>

----------------

**BronzeVZ:**
256mb of RAM
64mb of vSwap
20gb of disk space
500gb of monthly transfer
1 IPv4 address

<s>$3.99/month</s> **_$3.59/month_** with coupon code SANDIEGORELEASE

San Diego, CA: <a href="https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=80&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3"> HERE </a>
Buffalo, NY: <a href="https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=6&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3"> HERE </a>

----------------

**CopperVZ:**
512mb of RAM
96mb of vSwap
35gb of disk space
750gb of monthly transfer
1 IPv4 address

<s>$6.99/month</s> **_$6.29/month_** with coupon code SANDIEGORELEASE

San Diego, CA: <a href="https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=81&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3"> HERE </a>
Buffalo, NY: <a href="https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=8&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3"> HERE </a>

All of our other Premium OpenVZ plans are eligible for this coupon code, but do not meet LET pricing guidelines. 

FYI: As outlined in the AUP/TOS ( http://ipxcore.com/auptos/ ), all new registrations MUST be made with verifiable postal address information. Repeating your province/state in the address fields will cause your account to be suspended til you update your account information. These plans are auto-verified with Maxmind; if you get auto-tagged for fraud, open a support ticket for resolution. All plans are also subject to manual verifications.

You are encouraged to exercise the 3-day trial period (outlined in http://ipxcore.com/auptos/ in the Billing section ) and determine if this service will be right for you.

Buffalo test IP: 198.144.190.10
San Diego test ip: 209.112.254.18

We also do custom plans. Please contact us with your requirements.
